title: Minimum Legal Chain
description: JSON schema for representing the eight structural links of the Minimum Legal Chain (MLC). Each property corresponds to one link and must be present.

authority.description: Source of authority. Should reference an entity capable of conferring power.

id.description: Identifier or URI of the authority.

valid.description: Whether the authority is validly conferred.

withinScope.description: Whether the event falls within the jurisdiction.

roleName.description: Name of the role (e.g., doctor, police officer).

valid.description: Whether the role was validly conferred.

reference.description: URI or citation of the norm.

inForce.description: Whether the norm is in force at the relevant time.

process.description: Authorised process followed by the actor.

procedure.description: Name or description of the procedure followed.

complied.description: Whether the procedure was complied with.

event.description: Legal event produced by the process.

recognition.description: Recognition or recording of the legal event by an institution.

institution.description: Identifier of the institution recognising the event.

description.description: Description of the remedy or repair.
